mapper.select: SELECT C.res_dog_pk AS resDogPk,C.size_pk AS sizePk,C.age,C.information FROM t_user A JOIN t_reservation B ON A.user_pk=B.user_pk JOIN t_reservation_dog_info C ON B.res_pk=C.res_pk WHERE A.user_pk=#{userPk} AND B.res_pk=#{resPk}

SELECT B.res_pk AS resPk ,B.user_pk AS userPk ,B.hotel_pk AS hotelPk,B.from_date AS fromDate ,B.to_date AS toDate,B.res_status AS cancle FROM t_user A JOIN t_reservation B ON A.user_pk=B.user_pk WHERE B.user_pk=#{userPk}
